product_name: prAna Saxton Pants - Men's 30" Inseam - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made from pinwale cotton corduroy with stretchy spandex, the prAna Saxton pants with 30 in. inseam are soft enough for lounging, yet durable enough for venturing up your favorite climbing route. Standard five-pocket styling. prAna Saxton pants have a standard fit. Closeout.
short_description: Made from pinwale cotton corduroy with stretchy spandex, the prAna Saxton pants with 30 in. inseam are soft enough for lounging, yet durable enough for venturing up your favorite climbing route.
